timeline.bodyText: The Properties type is used in the buildBundles method, so this line should not be removed.
timeline.author: bjhargrave
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -28,9 +28,7 @@ import static aQute.bnd.gradle.BndUtils.jarLibraryElements
 import static aQute.bnd.gradle.BndUtils.logReport
 import static aQute.bnd.gradle.BndUtils.unwrap
 
-import java.util.Properties

replies.bodyText: Err, it can only be because IntelliJ flagged it as "unused" - for some reason known only to IntelliJ. I'll add it back...
replies.author: chrisr3

replies.bodyText:
Ah, the explanation! Groovy imports these packages by default:
import java.lang.*
import java.util.*
import java.io.*
import java.net.*
replies.author: chrisr3
